text: Giovanni D'Anzi (1 january 1906 – 15 April 1974)Giovanni D'Anzi by Massimo Emanueli was an Italian singer-songwriter and composer. He sometimes performed in milanese dialect with some popular songs as Oh mia bela Madunina or El Biscella. D'Anzi died on 15 April 1974 in Santa Margherita Ligure, Italy at the age of 74. In the last part of his òlife, he was also painter. ==Related pages== * List of Italian painters ==References== Category:1906 births Category:1974 deaths Category:Italian singer-songwriters Category:20th-century Italian composers Category:Musicians from Milan Category:Italian painters
title: Giovanni D'Anzi
